ai-patthana16.45:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.45:0.3_0: proceeding the support of the body.
ai-patthana16.45:1.1_0: Because of the dimension of infinite consciousness, the support is not a condition for the arising of thought.
ai-patthana16.45:2.1_0: Because of not seeing the support for the sake of investigating, nor for the sake of principles.
